channel.title: PI doors
channel.description:
Okay since there's like 4 different options for adding doors, which one do I go with and how do I add it so the door will open?
If the opening isn't possible, is there a way to remove the door?

item.title: PI doors
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=466196.msg3409521#msg3409521 date=1290564772]

To remove them, hard-code like `Delta did.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,465138.msg3401521.html#msg3401521

Why? Can’t you just make them work? Hard-Coding seems a bit extreme for a door…
[/quote]
Don’t have a spare PI source around, and never got around to learning how the doors worked.
I was more focused on the core of the server, and the skill/minigame content.

Though; I know there are guides over on R~S.[/quote]

Yeah, I got it. I just removed the door.

Read full topic

item.title: PI doors
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:1, topic:370079”]Okay since there’s like 4 different options for adding doors, which one do I go with and how do I add it so the door will open?

If the opening isn’t possible, is there a way to remove the door?[/quote]
if i’m not mistaken, deltascape servers should have a deleteObject/removeDoor method. just use CTRL+F
and make sure in your doors.cfg you use a tab to separate the configuration identetities

something like:

// door-id ---- doorx ---- doory ---- newxaxis ---- newyaxis
1000 3222 3218 3222 3219

Read full topic
